About Me

Hello, my name is Uriel. I am a Computer Engineering student in my last semester. I have worked as a network system administrator and as a Test Engineer. I also have some experience as a web developer. I am passionate about technology, generating projects, and teamwork.

Education

Ingeniero en Computacion

2019 - 2023

During my time at CUCEI, I acquired most of my key skills that I have carried throughout my career, such as teamwork, project management, and leadership, as well as the ability to meet tight deadlines. I enjoyed my time at the university very much and learned a lot about maintaining a healthy work-life balance.

I devoted a significant portion of my free time as a member of the student society, taking on roles such as the president of my major and General Student Representative..
